Text: Fancy internationally competitive #AIResearch ? Interested to establish a new #AI #research  institute? Have a look at our website - we are #hiring  👉https://t.co/QHcrAgRGAV https://t.co/3ZjaCRAIzE

🗓️ 27.02.2023, BIFOLD Colloquium: 30 years of imaging the brain with fNIRS. Start a discussion with Prof. David Boas, Professor of Biomedical Engineering at Boston University, on the impact this could have on  brain science studies.👇https://t.co/LsnFb8KKPu https://t.co/DEluUZK6q9
🎉 Congratulations!
🎊Congratulations to all @bifoldberlin researchers and colleagues!

Visiting #BIFOLD artist in residence @barottimarco in his studio, our researchers already got a sneak preview. Also interested to see the first prototypes of his new artwork "Corals"? Join him at the Berlin Open Lab-Symposium! 👉https://t.co/HYwtaF6iQY & https://t.co/s1o0y3CIew https://t.co/BFyg1mKBtN

AI meets physics: BIFOLD scientists & colleagues from @TCPUniLu accelerate molecular dynamics simulations using global machine learning force fields trained with clever numerical tricks. Published in @ScienceAdvances; DOI:10.1126/sciadv.adf0873; https://t.co/GwZ9B70wHD, @GoogleAI
https://t.co/oay01UDS0H

📢 Looking for new research challenges in #AI, #MachineLearning  or #datamanagement and their intersection? Then come and join our team. We are hiring! 👉 https://t.co/QHcrAgA5cl https://t.co/JSfnpVaMr1

📢to all historians looking for digital tools to analyze historical sources: CorDeep, a #ML based web application, is able to extract 4 different classes of visual elements within historical sources from the 15th to the 17th centuries. 👉https://t.co/m2QrelpSNi https://t.co/uxXBO5mXD9
👏 Congratulations!
📢 join the team @bifoldberlin

🥳Congratulations to @bifoldberlin researchers Giuseppe Caire, Klaus-Robert Müller & @FrankNoeBerlin, who - again - made it onto the #HighlyCited2022 list, which highlights researchers who have significantly influenced their fields over the last decade.
🏆Congratulations to @bifoldberlin researchers Klaus-Robert Müller, Grégoire Montavon and Wojciech Samek! 👉https://t.co/4blTytYewT
Welcome to the science journalist fellowship program of @Falling_Walls. We are happy to present and discuss some cutting edge #BIFOLD research projects @FDT_Berlin. https://t.co/fgCQgP4Wzg
📢Listening tip: @bifoldberlin fellow @matthiasboehm7 on the Data Epoch podcast 👇

#Cybersecurity is a key asset for the digital society. A group of scientists led by @bifoldberlin researchers showed that research with #ML in cybersecurity contexts is often prone to error. 👉https://t.co/aUlNsLkc1i 
@ErwQui @mlsec @fbpierazzi @lcavallaro @chwress @darpsec https://t.co/4qlFdZwa4b
🥳 Congratulations to @bifoldberlin fellow Prof. Dr. Marina Höhne!

📢Official start of the #BIFOLD & Science Gallery Berlin artist in residency @FDT_Berlin: Many thanks to artist @barottimarco and curator Claudia Schnugg, who introduced the BIFOLD community to the fascinating project "Corals". https://t.co/dsgYfl4zh6

🗓️#BIFOLD Colloquium, Oct. 17th, 4-5 pm @FDT_Berlin, we kick off the new artist-in-residence program "Kunst der Verschränkung" (Art of Entanglement) — a joint project between BIFOLD and the @ScienceGallery Initiative @TUBerlin. 👉https://t.co/JxkgVTForE https://t.co/l7u2VlRExa
📢Listen to - among other - #BIFOLD Fellows @matthiasboehm7 and Slawomir Stanczak @FDT_Berlin 👇

🗓️#BIFOLD Colloquium: Oct. 10, 2022, 4pm - 5pm. "Measuring web cookies in governmental websites" by @GSmaragdakis. Up to 90% of governmental websites in some countries add cookies of third-party trackers without consent from users. More information:👇https://t.co/lUfelycK1m
@LamarrInstitute @landnrw @MKW_NRW @BMBF_Bund 🥳Congratulations!

📢Want to know more about how trust in digital infrastructures and #AI could be established? Then register for the @FDT annual event and listen to - among others -  #BIFOLD Fellows @matthiasboehm7 and Slawomir Stanczak. 👇

🥳Today #BIFOLD welcomed the Governing Mayor of Berlin Franziska Giffey @RegBerlin, Senator Ulrike Gote @SenWGPG, Svenja Marx @BMBF_Bund, President of @TUBerlin Geraldine Rauch & CEO of @ChariteBerlin Heyo Kroemer @bbaw_de to celebrate permanent federal-state funding. https://t.co/iGA0zi0Isl

A warm welcome to all our international guests for the 2nd day of the #BIFOLD Research-Symposium and Opening @bbaw_de.
Our keynotes in the morning cover e.g. quantum machine learning or learning and data as the foundation for medical breakthroughs. https://t.co/2QK0wCe14s

Full house: >100 international scientists joined us today for the #BIFOLD Research-Symposium @FDT_Berlin. Scientific keynotes on e.g. image-scaling attacks in #ML or molecular simulation with #DeepLearning led to intensive discussions. Looking forward to tomorrow's sequel! https://t.co/luK08ShTPV

🥳Congratulations: Italian media artist Marco Barotti   is #BIFOLD artist in residence 2022! Looking forward to a fascinating interaction of #AI, #BigData & #art. 👇https://t.co/Tx4lpAxZ8K @barottimarco @TUBerlin @ScienceGallery https://t.co/CdnMr1hHV1

#BIFOLD Researcher @GSmaragdakis & team performed a large-scale measurement study of more than 5,500 official government websites. The study shows that up to 90% of these official websites in some countries add third-party tracker🍪without user consent.👉https://t.co/stzvpuJiLF https://t.co/HDqBwZreVc

🗓️ Understanding how humans make decisions is one of the most important topics in cognitive #neuroscience. In his talk Prof. Christian Wallraven, Korea University, presents his research with a focus on decision-making in risky situations. 👉https://t.co/GosnQOLbit https://t.co/5VAOHqe60F

📢BIFOLD Colloquium: @rfschwarz uses machine learning and statistical algorithms to explore the causes and functional consequences of differences in tumors and cancer evolution. Listen to his talk on July 4, 2022 👉https://t.co/cHfDEXgBv8 https://t.co/JJtjS0RndX

Happy to share good news:🥳starting today #BIFOLD receives permanent funding from the State of Berlin and @BMBF_Bund. Our researchers explore #datamanagement & #ML with the aim to create genuinely new knowledge in the sciences, humanities & economy.👉https://t.co/qC8VC07nvx https://t.co/r64kB2d53A
Check out the new @NatureComms publication by a group of #BIFOLD researchers & colleagues: BIGDML - Towards accurate quantum machine learning force fields for materials https://t.co/mPWRtVwFSX

4th day of #BIFOLD Summer School at @JWI_Berlin and still going strong: 26 PhD students discuss with guest speakers from Japan, Sweden, UK and Germany about #ethics in #datascience and #ML, with special foci on #XAI and sustainable AI. https://t.co/WpKnPwjyQ8

#BIFOLD welcomes all participants of the Summer School. The aim is to complement technological research on #AI with ethical aspects. The program includes  hands-on workshops, guest lectures from international researchers, a panel discussion, and Ph.D. student presentations. https://t.co/QOjHNIg9Ie
📢Last call:

📢We are #hiring! You have a track record in  #sciencecommunications & #socialmedia 👩‍🔬? Then join the #BIFOLD Communications & PR Team in #Berlin. Apply here 👇: https://t.co/TJ258ZxdTa https://t.co/RAU5LliAQz

🗓️June 30, 2022: Listen to interesting discussions on #OpenScience, research assessment and evaluation and join #BIFOLD researcher Begüm Demir at Open Forum I: Fundamental principles: Should stakeholder inclusion matter to the European Research Council?

🗓️Save the date: In their lecture on June 15 #BIFOLD guests @dora_hermes & @Kai_J_Miller present a new set of paradigms and machine learning algorithms to understand single-pulse electrical stimulation in the human brain.👉https://t.co/lCbMerC4zt

#BIFOLD researchers developed a new admission control approach that accepts e.g. #ML training workloads only if they can be computed using renewable 🌬️🌞excess energy. 👇https://t.co/uxwh7j7uvl @PhilippWiesner @lauritzthamsen @Odej7 https://t.co/gMGu1f8TQJ

#SaveTheDate ⏰ On 13.6. Gabriele Mencagli @Unipisa presents different perspectives on data stream processing for resource-constrained devices. 👉Please register for this virtual #BIFOLD #Colloquium: https://t.co/FctUKj5ch5 https://t.co/WMk7v0IERO

📢Interested in advanced urban remote sensing? #BIFOLD guest Prof. Paolo Gamba, University of Pavia, Italy, gives an invited 8h lecture in the week of June 13.-17. 2022 in Berlin. Step by and listen:  https://t.co/LberEPiePj https://t.co/u4NTqSoevE

Several @ELLISforeurope units & industry partners cooperate in the new „Konrad Zuse School of Excellence in Learning and Intelligent Systems“. The young researchers benefit from cross-institutional mentoring through #AI experts like #BIFOLD researcher @WojciechSamek  @TUBerlin

#friendlyreminder 👉 Join the lecture „#MachineLearning for Remote Sensing Applications powered by Modular #Supercomputing Architectures“ with Gabriele Cavallaro @fz_juelich on Friday, 2 pm! ➡️ More info here: https://t.co/6S1gQ2SvLV

#BIFOLD #Colloquium #TUBerlin @fzj_jsc

#dontmiss 👉 In our next #BIFOLD #Colloquium Gabriele Cavallaro @fz_juelich will give a.o. an overview of the work & research activities of the "#AI and #ML for Remote Sensing" Simulation and Data Lab hosted at the @fzj_jsc! ℹ️ https://t.co/6S1gQ2SvLV https://t.co/zThyynxtKn

The demo paper“Farming Your #ML-based Query Optimizer’s Food“by a team of #BIFOLD & #TUBerlin researchers has won the ICDE 2022 Best Demo Award!They presented a framework for efficiently creating training data for optimizers with learning-based components. https://t.co/7dbcNhpMvB https://t.co/ypJD7nyPp6

How can we understand the decisions made by #AI & apply these insights practically? That’s what the new book "xxAI - Beyond Explainable AI” by the #TUBerlin Profs & #BIFOLD researchers @WojciechSamek & Klaus-Robert Müller is about.
👉Read more: https://t.co/lbVEIufOCY https://t.co/7SVRT06Z4a

📣 The team of @nebulastream just released version 0.2.0. The system aims to unify data management approaches that are realized in different systems: cloud-based streaming systems,fog-based data processing systems & sensor networks. 👉Read more: https://t.co/1A8z5o9aDT
#DIMA #AIM https://t.co/C6OXThHMqp

🥳Congratulations to @GGevay and a team of #BIFOLD researchers who were awarded a 2021 ACM @sigmod Research Highlights Award for their paper: Efficient Control Flow in Dataflow Systems: When Ease-of-Use Meets High Performance. 👉https://t.co/MSdXNgjr2q https://t.co/urisv5wAIR

Wow❗Within one week, the book Beyond #ExplainableAI by @WojciechSamek & #BIFOLD co-director Klaus-Robert Müller et al. has reached 30,000 downloads! 👏 Take a look for yourself! #OpenAccess 👉 https://t.co/J95rD5InxM

#readingtip The first issue of this year's @sigmod record showcases research projects exemplifying core #database research. 👉 Check out some contributions of Co-Director Volker Markl and his #BIFOLD team: https://t.co/2jm9E05GTG https://t.co/NoWqyeTOAT
Congratulations to #BIFOLD Alumna Eleni Tzirita Zacharatou! 🎉👏 All the best for the new position @ITUkbh_IT!

Large medical datasets are difficult to acquire.#Datasharing could be a solution - if irreversible anonymization is guaranteed. In an international team,#BIFOLD scientists published encouraging steps for privacy-preserving data sharing in medical imaging.👉https://t.co/W4eQrVpcYR https://t.co/AY96J7hAyz

🎉Congratulations to #BIFOLD researcher @WojciechSamek! As of May 1, he is appointed Professor of #MachineLearning and Communications at @TUBerlin. We wish him every success and look forward to many exciting joint research projects. 👉 https://t.co/lgjWWDQTec https://t.co/L9xJJeKFuw

#NumberOfTheDay 2️⃣0️⃣0️⃣ – Data centers worldwide consume currently over 200 TW/h per year (40% of total German energy consumption). #BIFOLD researchers investigated how scheduling computing tasks can reduce emissions. 👉Read more: https://t.co/GqzbNkLd0i @lauritzthamsen https://t.co/zaMM7jbFyK

💪 We are overwhelmed by the many exciting project proposals for our new artist in residence program. Thanks a lot!🎉 Now it's time for the difficult task of selection. Stay tuned!
@ScienceGallery #TUBerlin #BIFOLD https://t.co/HcgLxhJQlr

#readingtip What are the main system challenges required to comply with #datatransfer obligations in context of federated data processing?#BIFOLD researchers @kbeedkar,J.Quiane & V.Markl present work on compliant #dataprocessing & discuss current research: https://t.co/guzcDbPDuh https://t.co/ZXDZvQd5TA

#lastcall Until april 25 there is still time to apply for the new artist in residence program by @Science_Gallery, #TUBerlin & #BIFOLD. The goal of the program is to combine artistic & scientific perspectives of #AI.Applications are open to #Berlin artists.https://t.co/0sSeS22fm0 https://t.co/XASWv7tFdq

#readingtip 📚 Material scientists have something to look forward to: #BIFOLD researchers @TUBerlin & #GoogleResearch developed an algorithm to efficiently predict the potential energy state of individual molecules using quantum mechanical data. More 👉 https://t.co/al8zt44WYQ https://t.co/WR4dHHv5KY

#readingtip 📖 Imagine manipulated images of traffic signs being introduced into the learning process of an #AutonomousDriving system! 🚨 Konrad Rieck @mlsec & #BIFOLD reseachers developed methods to prevent image-scaling attacks on #ML.
👉 https://t.co/zrqlbsyZiv https://t.co/jgvW5EEWG3

#readingtip Data centers worldwide consume large amounts of energy.⚡To reduce the #CarbonFootprint of cloud computing, #BIFOLD researchers investigated the potential of shifting delay-tolerant compute workloads to times when #RenewableEnergy is available: https://t.co/ntNTBo58zu https://t.co/XKcKwymQg2

Great news!👍 For our new 30.000 € endowed artist in residence program “Art of Entanglement” we’re looking for #Berlin based artists who are interested in #BigData, #ML, #DataManagement & their intersection. More 👉 https://t.co/0sSeS2jQKA https://t.co/km1UQyNqYC

#FriendlyReminder 👉 Don`t miss today’s #BIFOLD #Colloquium with Georgia Koutrika @athenaRICinfo, starting at 3:00 pm.
ℹ️ Further information: https://t.co/NEvjnUtOcX

#DocumentFreedomDay How can users be supported to develop new AI applications? Several #BIFOLD @TUBerlin researchers are designing Agora, a data infrastructure for building open ecosystems for #DataScience & #AI innovation. Details: 👉 https://t.co/cdHHohve4d https://t.co/CaiOSY446c

#DocumentFreedomDay Do you have digital data to analyize? Jorge Quiané & other researchers of #BIFOLD @TUBerlin developed Apache Wayang, the first system that provides an abstraction to run federated analytics & #AI wherever the data lives. More:👉 https://t.co/ckwI8frPxB https://t.co/5AVZ3QXGRY

Imagine a system that allows users to dig into data & find answers by conversing like a human?🤖 In our next #BIFOLD #Colloquium Georgia Koutrika @athenaRICinfo will give an overview of efforts & challenges behind the intelligent data assistant Datagent.
ℹ️https://t.co/NEvjnUtOcX https://t.co/3Z4O33wFyL

#lastcall ⏰ You want to work in an international team of experts on future technologies such as #AI, #ML & #DataScience in #BrainCityBerlin? Then check out our offer of 10 #PhD projects until 30.3.! ℹ️ https://t.co/noUMXW1PPn https://t.co/fXjInyN7yH

You are looking for special data? 👀 How about that: 519 Scientific Papers, 55 Open Source Tools, 163 PhD Graduates, 9 Research Groups, 54 Industry Projects, 34 Start-Ups, 21 Agility Projects... 
All of that is #BIFOLD.👍 More about us: https://t.co/OydE6xHJCM https://t.co/rXAODQxzIX

#reminder ❗ Want to explore the role of art & culture in the rapidly evolving wave of #AI innovation in #BrainCityBerlin?
👉Check out the open call of the artist in residence program by @Science_Gallery Berlin, #TUBerlin & #BIFOLD until 25.4.: https://t.co/0sSeS2jQKA https://t.co/QvD7vWkEFZ

Do you know CQELS?💡It‘s a semantic stream processing & reasoning framework, used in several EU & industry projects. #BIFOLD @TUBerlin supports #CQELS 2.0 for neural-symbolic reasoning operations on multimodal stream data.
ℹ️ More: https://t.co/wmL1iTOOFd https://t.co/sNfr38JjXR

Berlin-based artists, take note!⚠️ Together with @ScienceGallery Berlin #TUBerlin we announce a new artist in residence program combining artistic & scientific perspectives of #AI, endowed with 30.000 Euro. ℹ️ All details at https://t.co/0sSeS2jQKA https://t.co/JudrHWT6dd

Climate services & #ML – #BIFOLD researcher Begüm Demir gives an invited talk at the virtual 2022 @ECMWF Machine Learning Workshop (29.3.-1.4.) on „Learning from Noisy Class Labels for Earth Observation“. 👉Register until 22.3.: https://t.co/8A2HDSlcfI https://t.co/0Sl93XzLu6

📢#BIFOLD Graduate School offers 10 new #PhD projects in the areas of #AI, #ML & #DataScience. BIFOLD addresses new challenges evoked by the rapidly growing importance of AI in virtually all domains from medicine & natural sciences to humanities 👇https://t.co/TJ258ZxdTa https://t.co/pqOVtBykrX

#NumberOfTheDay 4️⃣ – DISH Lab, XAI Lab, IoT Lab and SCI Lab - are the names of our 4 research labs, two more coming soon. They define larger research themes based on strategic needs and shape #BIFOLD’s research profile over time. 👉Read more: https://t.co/GW5snxyHmb https://t.co/cMmrteN4Kg

#Reminder On Monday, @YingjunWu, founder & CEO of @SingularityData, is our guest at #BIFOLD #Colloquium.
👉Click here to get more information:
https://t.co/l6tZffYOVr

What’s #BIFOLD about?💡Conducting groundbreaking foundational #research in #BigData Management and #MachineLearning, as well as their intersection, educating future talent, and creating high-impact knowledge exchange. 👉Stay up to date: https://t.co/vlWjnZbaLF https://t.co/JZc2XXpBcb

Streaming systems become increasingly important for extracting business value from data in real-time.@SingularityData CEO Yingjun Wu provides insights on how to design streaming-aware compaction & caching strategy to achieve better end-to-end performance.ℹ️https://t.co/b005YxeuSB https://t.co/wknc9QPeLH

#readingtip 📖 #BIFOLD researchers @tuberlin have developed an #AI-algorithm to implement inverse chemical design & thus generate targeted molecules based on their desired properties. Now published in @NatureComms...👇
https://t.co/q6kfKA2RIK
#newpublication @ktschuett @nature https://t.co/kVvfibQGux

Black Box AI-Systems?🤔#BIFOLD researchers propose a new procedure that is applicable to a wide range of domains, to make existing AI explanation methods more robust and reliable. #XAI 👉https://t.co/FxyZt9sGia https://t.co/GYc4igGEUz

Want to evaluate the goodness of your explanation method? 👀
Scientists @TUBerlin_UMI @FraunhoferHHI & #BIFOLD are presenting #QUANTUS, an explainable #AI toolkit for responsible evaluation of #neuralnetwork explanations.
Further information...⤵️

👉21.2. #BIFOLD Colloquium: Alexandre Tkatchenko @uni_lu @TUBerlin talks about electrons and Machine Learning Force Fields. ℹ️ Information & registration: https://t.co/Vl2csAgrLK
#ML #MachineLearning #tuberlin #science https://t.co/FApFQE4Flb

#ApacheFlink is a project with a very supportive, continuously growing community.🤝At #BIFOLD Colloquium Fabian Hüske will discuss Flink’s journey from an academic research project by 3 PhD students @TUBerlin in 2009 to a successful project of @theASF. ℹ️ https://t.co/nnLhaenPQB https://t.co/FStTq3ygEq

#Reminder Don't forget today's Distinguished Lecture with Prof. Dr. Volker Markl #BIFOLD @TUBerlin @emergen_City at 4.15-5.15pm. He'll talk about #Database Systems and #Information Management as well as Trends & Visions. ℹ️ https://t.co/eKbdQqR9Wb

"Artificial Intelligence (#AI) should assist humans - not replace them," explains BIFOLD Co-Director Klaus-Robert Müller in an interview with @rbbabendschau. The entire interview (in German) 👇 https://t.co/xmMKInOM5v

Join our #AI #research teams in #BrainCityBerlin! 
We currently have seven open positions in Explainable AI #XAI, #MachineLearning #ML, and #DataManagement #BigData. Applications are possible until 31/12/2021!
👉https://t.co/TJ258ZxdTa
#jobs

In his recent @NeurIPSConf 2021 paper, BIFOLD researcher @robvdm provides the first solid theoretical foundations for applying low-rank methods to nonparametric density estimation – eliminating the curse of dimensionality in this area of #statistics.
👉https://t.co/5G1U7XwGNe https://t.co/pyONxmrQXz

From tweeting about a headache to questioning side effects of medicine – #SocialMedia is full of health-related information. BIFOLD researchers explore how to make this wealth of information machine-understandable to learn about population #health.
ℹ️https://t.co/Q29HCP1Puu https://t.co/o15RVNuqa1

Don't miss today's BIFOLD Colloquium, starting at 4 p.m.!
https://t.co/B4xKiUkrnb

🗓️Join the BIFOLD Colloquium on "Scalable and Fast Cloud Data Management" on December 06! 
Norbert Ritter, Felix Gessert, and Wolfram Wingerath will discuss cloud data management research and applications at @unihh and @baqendcom.👇
https://t.co/B4xKiUkrnb https://t.co/AnYcDB3ptg

⏰Last chance: Learn all about @kiez_ai - the new focus program on Artificial Intelligence #AI by Science & Startups, the network of #startup services of Berlin's universities. Register 👉https://t.co/XeUNnCAzF9
@bifoldberlin Co-Director Volker Markl and Fellow Frank Noé @FrankNoeBerlin are new members of the Berlin-Brandenburg Academy of Sciences and Humanities @bbaw_de. 👏Congratulations!

🗓️Save the date: 02/12/2021! 
Tina Klüwer and Susanne Perner will introduce @kiez_ai - the new #AI focus program of Science & Startups, the association of startup services from @BerlinUAlliance. 
More Information: https://t.co/G7Pv0QYO78

Happy to contribute to a strong #AI #research ecosystem in #BrainCityBerlin! 
Congratulations again to BIFOLD researchers Klaus-Robert Müller, @borlazzi, and @FrankNoeBerlin, who once again made it on the 2021 list of #HighlyCitedResearchers.

The podcast episode below (in German) gives great insight into the work of BIFOLD Fellows @M_Valleriani and Jürgen Renn to reconstruct the emergence of shared scientific knowledge in Europe.

More information on #ML in #ComputationalHistory:
https://t.co/C4ISuy2LAc

DDoS attacks are an almost daily, annoying phenomenon: @bifoldberlin researcher @GSmaragdakis and colleagues show that the exchange of information about ongoing #cyberattacks has the potential to detect and mitigate those attacks. 
ℹ️https://t.co/dO6Sj1TPG4 https://t.co/QSEbPNdlvR

Wanted: #biomedical #AI project ideas that potentially complement the @Virchow2_0 strategy to implement cell-based medicine in Berlin. 
Register👇
🗓️ Save the date:👇

🎉 Congratulations to the BIFOLD researchers, who are once again among the most #HighlyCitedResearchers in the world: BIFOLD Co-Director Klaus-Robert Müller (cross-field), Frank Noé @FrankNoeBerlin (cross-field) and Giuseppe Caire @borlazzi (computer science).
#HighlyCited2021

Using a virtual background during video calls is supposed to counteract privacy risks.  @bifoldberlin researchers explored how leaks in virtual backgrounds
can be exploited to reconstruct parts of the real environment.
